text:

--- Comment #6 from Siddhesh Akole (<mailto:siddheshakole@gmail.com|siddheshakole@gmail.com>) ---
Fetching comment...(In reply to Martin Maechler from comment #5)
I agree by Martin Maechler ,the bug is already fixed and it's working as is to
be. I verified it by building r-devel/r-svn on my linux , Thankyou .
